memberdef.name: outputVarsPINs
memberdef.initializer: = {PIN_RAQ, PIN_BMB, PIN_VALV_WATER_OUT, PIN_VALV_WATER_IN, PIN_IND_ALARM, PIN_IND_MIN, PIN_IND_MAX, PIN_IND_AUTO, PIN_IND_MAN}

detaileddescription.para: Read ESP32 GPIOs and stores in the image array
Read all inputs and store in the image array
This function reads all the inputs and stores them in the image array. The image array is used to store the current state of the inputs and outputs.

inbodydescription.para: Read the input from the GPIO

briefdescription.para: Write Outputs from array image to GPIO.

detaileddescription.para: Liga/desliga o modo auto.
Write all outputs from the image array to the GPIOs
This function writes all the outputs from the image array to the GPIOs. The image array is used to store the current state of the inputs and outputs.

inbodydescription.para: Write the output to the GPIO

detaileddescription.para: Inicia os outputs.
Configure GPIOs as INPUTs
This function configures the GPIOs as INPUTs. The GPIOs are used to read the state of the switches and sensors.
Inicia o sistema de arquivos.
Configure GPIOs as OUTPUTs
This function configures the GPIOs as OUTPUTs. The GPIOs are used to control the indicators, valves, pump, and resistor.
Inicia os inputs.
Get the Water Max object
This function returns the state of the water max sensor.
Retorna estado do sensor de agua de maximo.
This function returns the state of the water min sensor.
Retorna estado do sensor de agua de minimo.
This function returns the state of the alarm.
Retorna estado do alarme.
This function returns the state of the alarm.

briefdescription.para: Get the Auto Mode SW object.

detaileddescription.para: Retorna estado do modo auto.
This function returns the state of the auto mode switch.
Retorna estado do interruptor auto.
This function returns the state of the manual mode switch.
Retorna estado do indicador de alarme.
This function returns the state of the max indicator.
Retorna estado do botao manual.
This function returns the state of the min indicator.
Retorna estado do resistor.
This function returns the state of the alarm indicator.

briefdescription.para: Get the Valv Water Out object.

detaileddescription.para: Retorna estado da entrada de agua.
This function returns the state of the water out valve.
Retorna estado da valvula de vapor.
This function returns the state of the water pump.
Retorna estado da bomba de agua.
Set the Ind Max object
This function sets the state of the max indicator.

inbodydescription.para: Set the max indicator to ON
Send the max indicator value to the web server
Set the max indicator to OFF
Send the max indicator value to the web server

detaileddescription.para: Liga/desliga o indicador luminoso nivel agua maximo.
This function sets the state of the min indicator.

inbodydescription.para: Set the min indicator to ON
Send the min indicator value to the web server
Set the min indicator to OFF
Send the min indicator value to the web server

detaileddescription.para: Liga/desliga o indicador luminoso nivel agua minimo.
This function sets the state of the alarm indicator.
Liga/desliga o indicador luminoso alarme.
This function sets the state of the manual indicator.
Liga/desliga o indicador luminoso da resistencia.
This function sets the state of the auto mode.
Liga/desliga o indicador luminoso modo manual.
This function sets the state of the pump.

briefdescription.para: Set the Valve Water In object.

detaileddescription.para: Liga/desliga o indicador luminoso da bomba de agua.
This function sets the state of the water in valve.

briefdescription.para: Set the Valve Water Out object.

detaileddescription.para: Liga/desliga o indicador luminoso da valvula 1.
This function sets the state of the water out valve.
Liga/desliga o indicador luminoso da valvula 2.
This function sets the state of the resistor.
